A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I love Star Wars and saw this movie twice. I cannot walk away loving this movie. Too much went wrong. I don’t understand how this movie could be so poorly done but it was. So many pointless scenes and bumbling story. Scenes reminded me of Return of The Jedi with Rey and Ren acting like Luke and Vader about to see the Emperor. I hope the next movie is so much better I can forget about this mess. May the Force be with making this train wreck go away.
